mapper.select: SELECT PRDNO, PRDFILENAME, PRDNAME , PRDPRICE FROM ORDERDETAIL O, PRODUCT P WHERE P.PRDNO = O.GOODS_PRDNO ORDER BY ORDQTY DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT PRDNO, PRDFILENAME, PRDNAME , PRDPRICE FROM PRODUCT P WHERE P.PRDNO ORDER BY PRDNO DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT NSEQNO,NTITLE,NCONTENT,NDATE,ADMIN_ADMINID FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NSEQNO DESC
SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RNO, M.* FROM PRODUCT M, (SELECT @ROWNUM :=0) TMP ORDER BY RNO LIMIT #{param1}, #{param2}
